topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d987996368720f50010400#post_54d987996368720f50010400
Well Thor's powers are tied mostly to his hammer. If Mjolnir thinks that it's master is being a shitlord then it fucks right of and chooses a new master. This isn't the first time it's happened either. Look up Beta Ray Bill.

topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d986726368727cd3281d00#post_54d986726368727cd3281d00
Like
I understand doing a story about someone else wielding mjolnier. That's cool. 

That doesn't make them Thor 
Being Thor makes them Thor. 
Thor isn't like normal super heroes where his hero name is just a title that can be passed along. 
Thor is just Thor. 
That's just his name. 

And now the word Thor has stopped registering in my brain because I've said it too many times. 


"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d986cc6368725cd1072700#post_54d986cc6368725cd1072700
Marketing. They didn't want to call her lady Thor because that would be equally dumb (and apparently already happened) and didn't want her to be her own character because new things are hard and scary


"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d9870b6368727394200700#post_54d9870b6368727394200700
And then the post credits scene is all like her secretary sending in her next client. And she looks up and she's like "mr stark."
